anathema: Harm a child, pollute the wilds, refuse to treat an illness
edict: Cause destruction when angered, destroy aberrant creatures and fiends, live free of social or materialistic chains
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Chamidu (The Roar of the Storm)](/Deities.aspx?ID=612)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Cause destruction when angered, destroy aberrant creatures and fiends, live free of social or materialistic chains

**Anathema** Harm a child, pollute the wilds, refuse to treat an illness

**Area of Concern**
Children, fertility, wild beasts

**Pantheons**
[Weight Of The World](/Deities.aspx?ID=384)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=111), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=86)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=77)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=1694)

- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=1586)

- **5th**
[Moon Frenzy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1609)

</column>
name: Chamidu (The Roar of the Storm)
